snippet.title: Hey & Hello - Crystals Of Irm - DevLog 1
snippet.description:
#madewithunity #indiegames  #crystalsofirm 

Crystals Of Irm Discord 👉 https://discord.com/invite/JeXVRWz

Hey and hello! 
The new year starts slowly and so do I. Therefore, today there is the first video of the year and with it a great news.

I'm still trying out with the videos, so maybe it's all still a bit raw. But it will definitely get better. Have fun!

Crystals Of Irm Main Theme by https://soundcloud.com/fauni_music

Don't forget top Wishlist Crystals Of Irm 👇
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1971470/Crystals_Of_Irm/ 

Crystals Of Irm is an old school RPG with a distinctive combat system and dungeon crawl elements. With three heroes you explore Irm, visit the different regions of the land and climb deep down into the darkest dungeons.

More info about the game lotsofstuff.de/crystals-of-irm
